AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.description: I create modern web applications with responsive design and a focus on clean, maintainable code. My technologies include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more. My goal is to help clients achieve their objectives through effective and quality solutions.

simplicity.title: Simplicity and Convenience
simplicity.description: I develop interfaces that are intuitive and responsive.
simplicity.backText: Simplicity and UX are key to success.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: I always strive to write easily readable and maintainable code.

learnability.title: Learnability
learnability.description: I study new technologies to stay on the cutting edge.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: I value knowledge sharing and know how to work with other developers.
